description: Create or update an email notification(alert) configuration.

resource_name.description: The name of the recovery services vault.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

alert_setting_name.description: The name of the email notification(alert) configuration.

request.description: The input to configure the email notification(alert).

properties.description: The properties of a configure alert request.
